footer.aboutText: International event dedicated to literary and film tourism, exploring creative economy and territorial development.

home.subtitle: Creative Economy, Innovation and Territorial Development
home.aboutText: The III International Conference on Literary and Film Tourism brings together researchers, professionals and students interested in exploring the intersections between literature, cinema, tourism and territorial development. Focusing on creative economy and innovation, the event offers a space for debate and exchange of international experiences.

keynotes.title: Keynote Speakers
keynotes.description: Meet the main speakers of the III International Conference
keynotes.intro: We are pleased to present renowned researchers from around the world, experts in literary tourism, film tourism and territorial development.

access.requestText: If you need any accessibility features not listed, please contact us in advance at litfilmtourismconferenceucs@gmail.com

venue.title: Event Venue
venue.description: Information about the location and how to get there
venue.ucsText: The conference will be held at the University of Caxias do Sul (UCS), one of the main higher education institutions in southern Brazil. The campus offers complete infrastructure for academic events.
venue.accommodationText: Caxias do Sul offers various accommodation options for all profiles. A list of partner hotels will be available soon.
venue.transportText: The city has its own airport and is 120km from Porto Alegre. Public transport and taxis are available.
